content.description: The following question refers to the topic of new political theories and monarchies in the Renaissance.
content.question: New political theories developed during the Renaissance were characterized by an emphasis on

choices.label: the formation of mass political parties
the creation of a unified European governing body
the establishment of a system of checks and balances to restrain monarchical excesses
the improvement of centralized forms of government

content.answer: the improvement of centralized forms of government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
